name: Fight Club Sandwich
description:
This is still a prototype and there are many bugs yet to be worked out but it's something you can see and play for now.

Features:

  • DualShock gamepad supported (for Player 2 only)
  • Original soundtrack

Featuring original chiptune music by
Luca Gentilforti
Jashin
Zachary Stofko

Keyboard Controls

1P2PUp
Down
Left
Right
Attack
W
S
A
D
FP
L
;
'
Return/Enter

Different moves can be performed when pressing the attack button with the direction.
